issue.title: Access the "requests" or "orders" views without rights creates a redirect loop
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

If you access the "requests" view without rights (Extraction responsible),redirect loop apprear.
GET http://asitvd.depth.ch/requests -> 303 Location : http://asitvd.depth.ch/requests

SAME for orders:
GET http://asitvd.depth.ch/orders -> 303 Location : http://asitvd.depth.ch/orders

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2
